text: Mário Alberto Nobre Lopes Soares, GColTE, GCC, GColL, KE (; 7 December 1924 - 7 January 2017) was a Portuguese politician. He served as Prime Minister of Portugal from 1976 to 1978 and from 1983 to 1985. He was President of Portugal from 1986 to 1996. ==Other websites== * Fundação Mário Soares * Soares' official site for the Portuguese elections of 2006 Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Prime ministers of Portugal Category:Presidents of Portugal Category:Portuguese lawyers Category:Portuguese educators Category:Historians Category:Atheists Category:Politicians from Lisbon
title: Mário Soares
